tool.name: aurora_bdss
tool.command:
######### each aurora tool generates a html file and have an files path directory associated with it. mkdir -p $report.files_path &&
######### three important paths: ######### 1. path to tool installation directory ######### 2. path to report html ######### 3. path to files_path directory associated with the report output. export TOOL_INSTALL_DIR='${__tool_directory__}' && export REPORT='$report' && export REPORT_FILES_PATH='$report.files_path' &&
############ create a hidden file to store r markdown rendering log touch $report.files_path/.r_rendering.log.txt &&
############ finally run the render.R script Rscript '${__tool_directory__}/rmarkdown_report_render.R'
-o $report -d $report.files_path
-s '$sra_ids_se' -p '$sra_ids_pe' -f $format

param.name: sra_ids_se
param.label: SRR/DRR/ERR accessions of single end SRA
param.help: A list of SRR/DRR/ERR accessions separated by comma or space. e.g. SRR039885

param.name: sra_ids_pe
param.label: SRR/DRR/ERR accessions of paired end SRA
param.help: A list of SRR/DRR/ERR accessions separated by comma or space. e.g. ERR1748507
